title: The Directors
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Kurosawa, Akira, 1910-1998
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Lean, David, 1908-
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Bergman, Ingmar, 1918-

Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - Appreciation
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Fellini, Federico, 1920-1993
description: A 'Life Magazine' reporter attempts to analyse the traits of a good director, talking to such noted directors as David Lean, Igmar Bergman, Kurosawa, Fellini and Hitchcock. Discusses the evolution of neo-realism, the technical advances that have brought about cinema verite and the New Wave directors and their influence.
